src:
FOTO: Chelsea vs Ajax, Cerita Delapan Gol dan Dua Kartu Merah
06 Nov 2019, 09:29 by AP, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia
Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Pertandingan antara Chelsea dan Ajax pada matchday keempat Liga Champions, di Stadion Stamford Bridge, Rabu (6/11) dini hari, berakhir dengan skor 4-4.


Upaya Tammy Abraham membuang bola malah membuat bola bersarang ke gawang Chelsea. Ajax unggul 1-0 pada menit kedua. (AP Photo/Ian Walton)



Eksekusi penalti Jorginho yang tak mampu dibaca Andre Onana membuat skor menjadi 1-1 pada menit kelima. Wasit menunjuk titik putih karena Joel Veltman melanggar Christian Pulisic.Â  (AP Photo/Frank Augstein)



Memasuki menit ke-20 Quincy Promes membawa Ajax unggul lagi. Promes menanduk umpan Hakim Ziyech. (AP Photo/Ian Walton)



Gagal mengantisipasi tendangan Hakim Ziyech, Kepa Arrizabalaga kemudian tercatat mencetak gol bunuh diri pada menit ke-35. Bola yang membentur tiang kemudian mengenai muka Arrizabalaga sebelum masuk ke gawang. Chelsea tertinggal 1-3 hingga turun minum. (AP Photo/Frank Augstein)



Babak kedua berjalan 10 menit, Ajax menambah gol melalui sepakan Donny Van De Beek dari dalam kotak penalti. (AP Photo/Frank Augstein)



Cesar Azpilicueta mencocor bola yang dilepaskan Tammy Abraham. Chelsea memperkecil ketertinggalan menjadi 2-4 pada menit ke-63. (AP Photo/Frank Augstein)



Wasit Gianluca Rocchi memberi kartu merah kepada dua pemain Ajax. Daley Blind mendapat kartu kuning kedua setelah dinilai melanggar pemain Chelsea, sementara Joel Veltman menerima kartu kuning kedua karena handsball. (AP Photo/Ian Walton)



Handsball Joel Veltman berbuntut penalti. Jorginho yang kembali menjadi algojo tendangan 11 meter, kembali memperdaya Andre Onana. Chelsea tertinggal satu gol saja pada menit ke-71. (AP Photo/Frank Augstein)



Chelsea menyamakan kedudukan pada menit ke-74 berkat tendangan Reece James. (AP Photo/Ian Walton)



Chelsea mengepung Ajax demi meraih kemenangan. Pada menit ke-78 Cesar Azpilicueta membuat bola bersarang di gawang Ajax untuk kali kelima, namun wasit menganulir gol karena Tammy Abraham lebih dulu handsball. (AP Photo/Ian Walton)



Chelsea dan Ajax bermain imbang 4-4. Kedua kesebelasan sama-sama mengoleksi tujuh poin. Ajax masih memimpin klasemen Grup K, diikuti Chelsea. Valencia yang juga memiliki tujuh poin berada di peringkat ketiga. Sementara Lille menempati posisi juru kunci. (AP Photo/Ian Walton)
text:
PHOTO: Chelsea vs Ajax, Story of Eight Goals and Two Red Cards
06 Nov 2019, 09:29 by AP, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia
Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - The match between Chelsea and Ajax on the fourth Champions League matchday, at Stamford Bridge Stadium, Wednesday (6/11) morning, ended with a score of 4-4.


Efforts to throw away the ball Tammy Abraham instead made the ball lodged into the Chelsea goal. Ajax winning 1-0 in the second minute. (AP Photo / Ian Walton)



Jorginho's penalty that Andre Onana couldn't read made the score 1-1 in the fifth minute. The referee pointed to the spot because Joel Veltman violated Christian Pulisic. (AP Photo / Frank Augstein)



Entering the 20th minute Quincy Promes brought Ajax ahead again. The promises gore Judge Ziyech's bait. (AP Photo / Ian Walton)



Failing to anticipate Judge Ziyech's kick, Kepa Arrizabalaga then recorded an own goal in the 35th minute. The ball that hits the post then hits Arrizabalaga's face before entering the goal. Chelsea left behind 1-3 until halftime. (AP Photo / Frank Augstein)



The second half runs 10 minutes, Ajax added a goal through kicking Donny Van De Beek from inside the penalty box. (AP Photo / Frank Augstein)



Cesar Azpilicueta hits the ball released by Tammy Abraham. Chelsea reduced the gap to 2-4 in the 63rd minute. (AP Photo / Frank Augstein)



Referee Gianluca Rocchi gave a red card to two Ajax players. Daley Blind received a second yellow card after being judged to have violated a Chelsea player, while Joel Veltman received a second yellow card for handsball. (AP Photo / Ian Walton)



Joel Veltman's handsball has a penalty. Jorginho who returned to the executioner kicks 11 meters, again deceiving Andre Onana. Chelsea left behind just one goal in the 71st minute. (AP Photo / Frank Augstein)



Chelsea equalized in the 74th minute thanks to Reece James's shot. (AP Photo / Ian Walton)



Chelsea surrounded Ajax for victory. In the 78th minute Cesar Azpilicueta made the ball nest in the Ajax goal for the fifth time, but the referee annulled a goal because Tammy Abraham was first handball. (AP Photo / Ian Walton)



Chelsea and Ajax drew 4-4. Both teams collect seven points. Ajax still leads Group K standings, followed by Chelsea. Valencia, which also has seven points, is ranked third. While Lille occupies the position of caretaker. (AP Photo / Ian Walton)
